title: I’d Like to Scold the Capture Targets - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Oneshot   Otome Game
author: Sakura Bushi   さくらぶし
description:
The student council members who hurt my best friend stopped doing their jobs once the fancied-by-several heroine showed up.

I won’t forgive you! You need to get an earful, so it would be better if you sit down there!>
